name: ai-education
description: AI Education System - Frontend and Backend

scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && python -c "import fastapi, uvicorn, pydantic" || echo 'Backend dependencies check'
scripts.build:docker:frontend: docker build -t frontend-precommit:test -f frontend/Dockerfile frontend/ && docker rmi frontend-precommit:test
scripts.build:docker:backend: docker build -t backend-precommit:test -f backend/Dockerfile backend/ && docker rmi backend-precommit:test
